title: Identify carrier for my Pixel 5
content:
I have a Pixel 5 bought for work. My problem is I must unlock the bootloader for a project. I understand that's "you're on your own, pal" country. 

My problem is I can't identify what carrier's phone this is. That is, is it VZW, T-Mobile, AT&T, etc. The "bloatware" apps aren't carrier specific (no My Verizon, for example). 

The question: Is there anything (for example, About Phone) that identifies which carrier this phone was built for?
